description: Improper Control of Filename for Include/Require Statement in PHP Program ('PHP Remote File Inclusion') vulnerability in snstheme BodyCenter - Gym, Fitness WooCommerce WordPress Theme allows PHP Local File Inclusion. This issue affects BodyCenter - Gym, Fitness WooCommerce WordPress Theme: from n/a through 2.4.

product.name: BodyCenter - Gym, Fitness WooCommerce WordPress Theme
